product_name: Shimano R088 Road Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: Stability, rigidity and light weight are 3 big reasons road riders will appreciate the expert-level details of the Shimano R088 performance bike shoes. Lightweight, glass fiber reinforced polyamide soles deliver maximum power transfer. Ratcheting microadjustable buckle straps allow subtle fit adjustments; offset rip-and-stick straps snug the fit without pressure points. Shoes feature reinforced synthetic uppers for durability and nylon mesh for breathability. Anatomically curved last provides a precise fit and improves foot stability. EVA footbeds cushion for walking comfort. Shoes feature a wider cleat adjustment range than previous Shimano shoes. Shimano R088 road bike shoes do not come with cleats.
